entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:24 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times mixed with snow near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
